price: 37. Boye abima kowuta na mayi ya mokongo te oyo elonama?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
